name: Angela Davis
description: American political activist, philosopher, academic, and author. Member of the Communist Party USA. Works on feminism, class, gender, and the abolition of prisons. Icon of the black power movement.

name: Fred Hampton
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of black liberation.

name: Huey P. Newton
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of black liberation.

name: John Brown
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of black liberation.

name: Malcolm X
description: African American civil rights leader, minister, and human rights activist. Prominent figure in the Nation of Islam and later Sunni Islam. Advocated black empowerment and Pan-Africanism.

name: Toussaint Louverture
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of black liberation.
